Our Design Track

Design is an ever changing dynamic and we’re here to guide you the way

We’re here to help you craft a path from any starting point.

Whether you're a beginner just getting into the field or at a professional level wanting to freshen up core design principles.

Design Tools

Sketch is where we'll take our wireframing and prototyping to the next level

Adobe XD is Adobe's toolkit varient for UI and UX designers who envision the future of the web

Adobe's ecosystem provides us powerful tools we'll dive deep into including Adobe Illustrator and Adobe Photoshop

Design Topics

Typography

Well-built websites can be plagued by bad typography, creating an unpleasant experience to the user. We’ll cover all you need to know to begin building websites with good typography, giving users a great experience.

Pallettes

Choosing the right pallette using color theory is vital for success in the web design field. Understanding what colors synergize together for a more visually appealing project enhances the entire experience, and we're here to show you how to mix and match.

Layout

In order to display content efficiently we have to make sure it's laid out in an appealing fashion. When creating layouts we'll make sure we take into account what layouts are suited for the best experience.

Wireframing & Prototyping

The wireframe, also known as the screen blueprint, is a visual guide that lays out the skeletal structure of a website. Afterwards we'll be converting our wireframes into usable prototypes, where we intertwine all of the previous topics to present to the client.

Sharing & Collaborating

What good is it to never share what you've created? We'll guide you step by step on how to create design portfolios at places such as Bēhance, Dribbble, and more!
